title: HB Shopping Spree
seo_description: Henri Bendel is a Girl's Playground consistently interpreting and reinventing itself as a destination rooted in the never-ending energy abundance and creativity of the city of New York.
contents:
“Henri Bendel is a Girl's Playground consistently interpreting and reinventing itself as a destination rooted in the never-ending energy abundance and creativity of the city of New York.” – Henri Bendel.

Make the most out of your trip to New York by indulging yourself in an exclusive shopping experience at Henri Bendel. When you book Henri Bendel Experience you receive a $5000 gift card from Henri Bendel along with a personal shopper, and your first night with us is complimentary; In addition, we will waive the Resident Privileges, offer a 2pm checkout and you will enjoy a luxury car transfer to and from Henri Bendel.

Your experience will start as soon as you walk into the Prestige Suite, located on the 21st floor with direct views of the iconic Times Square Ball and a private outdoor terrace seating up to six; and continues at Henri Bendel’s flagship store on Fifth Avenue, where a personal stylist will walk you through their wonderful selection.

Must be booked 7-days in advance.
